title: AccountEntryExt
description:
AccountEntryExt is an XDR NestedUnion defines as:

```text union switch (int v) { case 0: void; case 1: AccountEntryExtensionV1 v1; } ```

AccountEntryExtensionV1Ext.description:
AccountEntryExtensionV1Ext is an XDR NestedUnion defines as:

```text union switch (int v) { case 0: void; case 2: AccountEntryExtensionV2 v2; } ```

AccountEntryExtensionV2Ext.description:
AccountEntryExtensionV2Ext is an XDR NestedUnion defines as:

```text union switch (int v) { case 0: void; case 3: AccountEntryExtensionV3 v3; } ```

ExtensionPoint.description:
ExtensionPoint is an XDR Union defines as:

```text union ExtensionPoint switch (int v) { case 0: void; }; ```

Liabilities.description:
Liabilities is an XDR Struct defines as:

```text struct Liabilities { int64 buying; int64 selling; }; ```

SponsorshipDescriptor.description:
SponsorshipDescriptor is an XDR Typedef defines as:

```text typedef AccountID* SponsorshipDescriptor; ```

TimePoint.description:
TimePoint is an XDR Typedef defines as:

```text typedef uint64 TimePoint; ```
